name: Williamsburg Flight Center
about: Williamsburg Flight Center is an FAA-approved flight training and aircraft maintenance center located at the Williamsburg-Jamestown Airport (KJGG). The flight school offers a range of certifications, including Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Flight Instructor (CFI and CFII). Students learn flying safety skills in the classroom and practice take-offs, landings, and various maneuvers in the air, primarily using Cessna 172 Skyhawks. The center boasts a 90% success rate for students passing their final flight tests, above the industry standard. It also provides a scholarship program, the Williamsburg Aviation Scholarship Program (WASP), to support local students pursuing aviation careers. Additionally, the center offers air tours and maintains a repair shop for aircraft upkeep. With a mission to create safe and skilled pilots, Williamsburg Flight Center is dedicated to slow, steady growth and community involvement.
